BUG (?): if writing a long message, one can not see the whole text
BUG: a colon in the center of a word creates automatically a link
BUG: the gray bottom bar (where it reads about, feedback...) cuts on top of recent topics with smaller screens in laptops
REQUEST: a deleted topic "cemetary" and the ability to recall deleted topics from there within a day or so
REQUEST: ability to change the names of existing topics and to make stickies to the recent topics list
Actually, it would be nice if the admin of a group could customize how many topics will show in the recent topics list and how many topics can the group have.
More customization: let the group admin customize whether users can delete their own messages.

REQUEST: let users choose from which groups and from which topics they wish to recieve notifications (the red number next to "Groups" or when the browser tab isn't active, the numbers and the green icon in the convore-tab).

REQUEST: You could either add better support for a large number of topics in a group or put a reasonable limit to how many topics there can be in a group, like something around 20. The list of recent topics could also show way more than 8 last active topics, which is the current maximum.

Suggestion: When starting a new topic, require a key word.  Then a list of topics with the "key word" will appear.  This will give the poster the opportunity to add a comment to a current topic, rather than start a new topic.
bug when creating new account w/fb connect: https://skitch.com/stevepoland/r1ciy/finish-login-convore
An ability to view starred messages of a specific topic in a group would be nice
also have you considered implementing private messages?

Private messages would be nice! It might be best to implement them in the same way as mentioning and notification with @-tag. You could e.g. have # work in exactly the same way before a user name as @, with the difference that the message won't be shown to anyone else except the people that were tagged with # in that message.
@miikao Probably would not want to use # as that is conceptually overloaded for tagging.

I keep moving my mouse over to "GROUPS", and then clicking, like you would for any other dropdown menu. Instead of expanding the menu (which autoexpands on hover, I understand now) it sends me to http://convore.com (it's a link). Seems like it could just ignore clicks and everything would be fine, or it could be click to expand.
@t yeah, we definitely need to make that better

REQUEST: The MARK ALL READ button in the header bar is where GROUPS should be IMO. I often accidentally click MAR. It is justified with the messages, which leads me to believe it's the most significant button. Yet, when it's gone, the groups dropdown is sitting by itself further over to the right. The elegant justification with the message list is gone. It seems that the groups dropdown should be left justified with the message list and the MAR button might want to live over by the sound/search area.
Why are active topics within a group in reverse chronological order, but replies within a topic in "normal" chronological order?

It would be nice to have a photo upload tool in the bowser and the new iPhone app. As it is now we need to upload the photo to another service and then copy and paste the URL into the posting. A built-in upload tool would be nice. While we are at it the same for a YouTube video. A tool to insert the URL for the video that then displays the video in-line the way facebook does it. http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=KQqEKD7kze0
@SarasotaFlorida Having the photo or video on popular specialized sites isn't bad. Linking can be done embed.ly style.
